description: Conversion of existing dwelling into 2 self-contained flats including hip to gable and rear roof extension; two roof lights to front roofslope and single storey rear extension
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): WES 002 C, WES 003 C, WES 004 C, WES 005 C, WES 007 C, WES 009 C
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing premises.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4, 7.6 & 7.8 of The London Plan (Consolidated 2015) and Policies 7.4, 7B & 7C of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013). | Refuse storage shall be provided in accordance with the standards adopted by the Local Planning Authority. Such provision shall be brought into use prior to the first occupation of the development and retained permanently.

To protect the living conditions of occupiers of the area, in accordance with policies 3.5 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Adopted Ealing Development (Core) Strategy and The London Plan (July 2011) policy 5.16. | 4 secure cycle parking spaces (2 spaces per flat) shall be provided on site in accordance with the adopted standards of the London Plan 2015 and such provision shall be fully installed and brought into use prior to first occupation of the development and retained permanently.

Reason: To provide adequate facilities for cyclists, in accordance with policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Adopted Ealing Core Strategy and policy 6.9 of the London Plan 2011. | No part of the roof of the extensions shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with policy 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (g), 3.1 and 3.8 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan - consolidated (2015).
